name: pomodoro-timer
description: The Pomodoro Technique is a time management method developed by Francesco Cirillo in the late 1980s. The technique uses a timer to break down work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes in length, separated by short breaks - 5 minutes.

scripts.uglify: uglifyjs src/*.js -m -o src/app.js && uglifyjs src/*.js -m -c -o src/app.min.js
